Container.Name: sponsorblockcast
Container.Overview:
**Warning - this script may increase CPU usage. This is being investigated ** POSIX script to detect sponsor segments in YouTube videos played over Chromecast on your network.
You MUST set this container to use the Host network.
**Please note, this is not my script or application - support for CA Apps template only**

Config.Name: SBCPOLLINTERVAL
Config.Description: Frequency with which script will poll to see what is playing

Config.Name: SBCSCANINTERVAL
Config.Description: Sleep interval between scans to see if a Chromecast is playing YouTube on the network

Config.Name: SBCYOUTUBEAPIKEY
Config.Description: For instructions to get an API key, visit: https://developers.google.com/youtube/v3/getting-started
